channel.title: Introducing the New Linux Categories
channel.description:
Hi 0x00'ers! We had a request to make a Linux category. Since Linux is so apt to most hackers' workflows, it would be silly to _not_ support it here.
In response we now have two new categories:
* https://0x00sec.org/c/reference-database/linux - Which is to post cheatsheets and other things perhaps needed for later reference
* https://0x00sec.org/c/How-to/linux - Which is for Tutorials and How-to's related to Linux such as @L3akM3-0day's [tutorial on SSH tunneling](https://0x00sec.org/t/understanding-of-ssh-tunneling/766/5).
Have fun ;)
pry0cc

item.title: Introducing the New Linux Categories
item.dc:creator: Cromical
item.description:
Nice to have this set up! Will 0x00sec also set up OS X and Windows categories? Windows as it’s such a widely used OS, and OS X since (it being based off of FreeBSD/BSD) essentially offers the best of both worlds, as well as being widely used.

Read full topic
